: : Kup : :

Kup transformes, taking the scanner from Yggdrasil. He continues to 
monitor the battle as Yggdrasil leaves.

Kup then gets a message from Rattrap over the comm.

Kup(via commlink): What is it, lad?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil was still trying to interpret the data that was feeding 
> from inside the base.
> 
> Yggdrasil: He's either winning or going down. The shield prevents 
me 
> to tell who's who. Kup, take this long-range scanner (he removes it 
> from his forearm and hands it over). I have to go and oversee the 
> data transfer with Nightlight.
> 
> He switly goes away, moving as fast as he can.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I'm back!
> > 
> > : : Darkangel/Wolfenstein/SharpClaws/Kup : :
> > 
> > Darkangel, Wolfenstein and SharpClaws all stop fighting and stand 
> by 
> > their respective commanders. Wolf and Claws are somewhat damaged 
> but 
> > look strong. Darkangel has severe damge done to his exostructure.
> > 
> > SharpClaws: Why stand down, Hydras? They attacked us, we should 
> > destroy them!
> > 
> > On the outskirts of the battlefield, Kup waits in truck mode. He 
> > waits to see the results of Azure's actions.
